revised_title: Analytical Model for Spirally Bound Concrete Columns
tldr: This article presents an analytical model for predicting the strength and deformational behavior of axially loaded concrete columns with circular cross-sections and closely spaced spiral binding. The model uses mathematical expressions for the material properties of plain concrete and stress-strain relations of steel reinforcement to develop equations for both strength and deformational behavior. The theoretical results are shown to be in good agreement with experimental data from earlier investigations.
